name: Collaboration
text: I'm not available for urgent hiring needs or short-term firefighting.
I'm open to long-term collaboration or consulting for tech-first organizations whose mission extends beyond simply maximizing profit.
I'm employed at the DFINITY Foundation in Zurich, where I currently focus on making id.ai one of the world's leading authentication systems, with a strong focus on usability, privacy, and security.
I'm selective about additional work and only consider opportunities that align strongly with my values and expertise.
If you're a founder or technical decision-maker exploring a potential collaboration (now or in the near future), you're welcome to reach out.
Recruiters are welcome to contact me on behalf of a specific client who has reviewed my profile and explicitly requested my candidacy.
To make this efficient for both sides, please include:
2. Why you believe a collaboration would be mutually valuable
3. The first concrete problem you'd want me to work on
5. A link to your calendar for an intro call (if there's a fit)
